name: A Ninga on another Planet
description:
**IMPORTANT NOTE**: When you Close the Settings Menu, Remember to click away before continuing the game (this bug might ruin the experience so please pay some attention for it)

note: some bugs may occur in the game, any feedback would be great

.

The game will receive an Update after the voting period,

The Update will feature:

- A Boss Battle.

- New Enemies.

- NPC's .

- New Items & Enteractables.

- Better Backgrounds.

- More Enviroment elements.

- New Music Tracks.

- Easter eggs!

- A Taunt!

& More!

.

The Tutorial if you missed it:

1: Move with  "WASD".

2: Jump with "Space".

3: Collect Coins to win the game.

4: Pickup items with "E",

         Throw items with "Left click".

5: You can only hold 1 item at a time, you only have one room in your pocket.

6: Jump on spiders to kill them, They can push you higher

7: Flags Save Progress,

If you get stuck, or threw an item out of reach ,

you can Reload to the Flag through the settings menu

.

Items description:

Booster Boots: Allow you to jump higher!

Pickaxe: Can only break blocks horizontaly!

Shovel: Can only dig under you!

Shurikens: Can kill Spiders on your way!

Feather: Allows you to Float!

.

Made in 3 days for the IndeTales Game Jam!

The Theme: One Room.

You only have one room in your pocket to hold an item in it.

.

If you are Interested, Follow me to get a notification when the Update comes out!

.

Game By

     Ven

Music By

    Noha
